member.summary: Execute custom logic to optionally prevent access to a page node
member.param: Sitefinity page node corresponding to the sitemap node

member.summary: phrase: Download the app from the respective marketplace for each platform, and run it.
member.value: You need to have Sitefinity Box installed on your phone in order to use all apps created here.

member.summary: phrase: Now you can sign up, start taking pictures, and sharing moments that will be automatically uploaded to cloud.

member.summary: phrase: You can easily manage the generated content of your app in the Everlive Portal or push content to the device by creating it in the Portal itself.
member.value: All apps created here will be automatically available in your Sitefinity Box

members.member:
Compresses the resource files for the mobile im in .zip format to specific strem.
This method uses Config.xml stored as embedded resource. If a new folder is create under "Icenium" folder this should be declared in the folder structure in Config.xml file. The strem to which all files will be compressed in .zip format The configuration of the current module
